name: Tinkerers of the Unripe Fruit
description: Surviving a hellish meteor shower early in the family history, are the Tinkerers of the Unripe Fruit  blessed or cursed? They're also known for their stewardship of unripe Fruit Folk, and assisting with incubation when necessary. Now finally living a life of leisure as their ‘investments’ grow their wealth beyond imagining, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
